report.title: MNHNL Samples List
report.description: Form Internal Report: Used by the Surveys grid to retrieve the top level samples associated with a survey.
report.query: SELECT s.id, l.name as location_name, s.entered_sref, s.date_start, s.date_end, s.date_type, (select count(*) as num_occurrences from occurrences o where o.sample_id = s.id and o.deleted = FALSE) as num_occurrences, (select (count(*) > 0) as completed from occurrences o where o.sample_id = s.id and o.deleted = FALSE and o.record_status = 'C') as completed FROM samples s LEFT JOIN locations l ON l.id=s.location_id WHERE s.survey_id=#survey_id# AND s.deleted = FALSE #order_by#

param.name: survey_id
param.description: Select the survey to return data for?
param.query: SELECT id, title as caption FROM surveys
